title: Clear Lookup After Selection
goal: Automatically reset the customer search field and collapse results after a customer is selected.
environment: HTML + Vanilla JavaScript + Firebase + Jest + jsdom

specs.title: LookupClearsAfterSelection
specs.given: An admin selects a customer from the lookup list.
specs.then: The search input clears, the results list disappears (helper text returns), and the selection remains locked in the summary pill.

changeNotes: Added a RED test to enforce clearing the customer lookup input/list after a selection, and formally skipped the older focus-shift spec per updated requirements.
notes: Customer lookup should clear its query/results once a selection is made so admins can move on quickly while the previously selected summary stays locked until Change customer is used.
